ModMetaData.name: LMC069s.子母弹
ModMetaData.author: pyrofreak4321
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html One part modders resource, one part sick mortar shells Adds Air-burst Shells and Napalm for Mortars and a new projectile type for creating advanced explosions. Air-burst Shells are a high-er velocity mortar shell that peppers a large area with micro munitions. - Requires Submunitions research (2000, Mortars, Precision Rifling) - Crafting 6 required - 100 steel, 15 chem fuel - Work to build: 107 - Speed: 55 (HE-shells are 41) - “Blast” radius: 10 - Submunition blast radius: .9 - Submunition duration: 30 ticks (~0.5 sec) - Submunition pre-impact detonation: 30 ticks (~0.5 sec) - Submunition damage: 8, 200% AP (Bullet) - Submunition frequency: 10 every tick 空炸弹是一种高速迫击炮弹，能在很大的区域内覆盖微型弹药。 -需要子母弹研究（2000工作量，前置：迫击炮，精准步枪） -需要6级手工技能 -100单位钢铁，15单位化合燃料 -工作量：107 -速度：55（壳41） -爆炸半径：10 -子母弹爆炸半径：0.9 -子母弹持续时间：30节（~0.5秒） -子母弹预撞击爆炸：30节（~0.5秒） -子弹伤害：8200% AP（子弹） -子母弹频率：每格10次 Napalm Shells detonate before impact and create a stream of fire leading to the impact site. - Requires Submunitions research (2000, Mortars, Precision Rifling) - Crafting 6 required - 20 steel, 100 chem fuel - Work to build: 40 - Speed: 41 - “Blast” radius: 1 - Submunition blast radius: 2 - Submunition duration: till impact - Submunition pre-impact detonation: 70 ticks (~1 sec) - Submunition damage: default for “Flame” explosions - Submunition frequency: 1 every 5 ticks (~0.01 sec) 凝固汽油弹在撞击前引爆，形成一股火流，通向撞击地点。 -需要子母弹研究（2000工作量，前置：迫击炮，精准步枪） -需要6级手工技能 -20钢铁，100单位化合燃料 -工作量：40 -速度：41 -爆炸半径：1 -子母弹爆炸半径：2 -子母弹持续时间：直到撞击 -子母弹预撞击爆炸：70节（~1秒） -子母弹伤害：默认为“火焰”爆炸 -子母弹频率：每5帧1次（~0.01秒） Uses all standard explosion parameters and a modExtension for configuring submunitions. -CE compatibility: No idea... I don't use it, Not sure how much CE affects... Almost any feedback is welcome TO DO: - Minimum safe range - Roof checks - LOS checks - Figure out stack icons...
